name: Peter Njuguna
headline: Building innovative software solutions with modern technologies and clean code
about: Software Engineering graduate from Kisii University, class of 2025. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable software solutions and exploring emerging technologies in the software development landscape.
bio:
Hi there! I'm Peter, a Software Engineering graduate from Kisii University with a passion for building innovative software solutions. My journey in tech has been driven by curiosity and a love for solving complex problems through code.

I specialize in modern software development practices with a focus on writing clean, maintainable code. I'm particularly interested in web technologies, software architecture, and creating user-friendly applications. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new programming languages, contributing to open source projects, or staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

projects.title: HarmonyBot
projects.description: AI-powered bot that detects songs in real-time and generates complementary piano progressions using machine learning. Built with TensorFlow for audio processing and React for the interactive interface.
projects.longDescription: HarmonyBot represents the intersection of AI and music creativity. The application uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze audio input, identify musical patterns, and generate harmonically compatible piano progressions in real-time. The project showcases modern web audio APIs, TensorFlow.js integration, and responsive design principles.

projects.title: EcoTracker
projects.description: Sustainable living companion app that helps users track their carbon footprint and suggests eco-friendly alternatives. Features gamification elements and community challenges.
projects.longDescription: EcoTracker empowers users to make environmentally conscious decisions by providing personalized carbon footprint tracking, sustainable alternatives, and community engagement features. The app includes data visualization, achievement systems, and integration with environmental APIs.

projects.title: DevFlow
projects.description: Developer productivity tool that streamlines workflow management with integrated code review, task tracking, and team collaboration features. Built for remote development teams.
projects.longDescription: DevFlow addresses the challenges of remote software development by providing an integrated platform for code review, task management, and team collaboration. Features include real-time collaboration, automated workflow triggers, and comprehensive analytics.

projects.title: FinanceAI
projects.description: Personal finance management application with AI-powered insights and predictive analytics. Helps users make informed financial decisions through intelligent recommendations.
projects.longDescription: FinanceAI leverages machine learning to provide personalized financial insights and recommendations. The application analyzes spending patterns, predicts future expenses, and suggests optimization strategies for better financial health.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
achievements: Built responsive web applications serving 10,000+ users
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Implemented automated testing increasing code coverage to 85%
Mentored 2 junior interns on modern web development practices

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Designed and implemented user interfaces for e-commerce platforms. Focused on accessibility and mobile-first responsive design.
achievements: Increased user engagement by 25% through improved UI/UX design
Reduced page load times by 50% through optimization techniques
Implemented WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all projects
Led code reviews and established frontend development guidelines

experience.title: Open Source Contributor
experience.description: Active contributor to open source projects, focusing on developer tools and educational resources. Maintaining several npm packages.
achievements: Maintained npm packages with 50,000+ monthly downloads
Presented at 3 local tech meetups on modern web development

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
achievements: Contributed to various software development projects
Strong foundation in software engineering principles

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Alex is an exceptional developer with a keen eye for detail. His ability to quickly grasp complex concepts and translate them into elegant code is remarkable.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: Working with Alex was a pleasure. He consistently delivered high-quality work and showed great initiative in improving our development processes.
